column4: Hi. I'd like to listen to Pink Floyd with my new headphones but I have the ubuntu sounds piercing my eardrum every time I click a button. I am using fluxbox and it doesnt seem to respect the gnome settings where the sound theme is disabled. What is responsible for the sounds and how can I kill them?
I guess I have to log out and log back in to actually get rid of the sounds huh?
the ubuntu-sounds package is gone, I logged out and back in but the sound theme is still there
